mapper.select:
SELECT NULL AS "setaiCode" ,NULL AS "hihokenshakanamei" ,NULL AS "hihokenshamei" ,1 AS "taishojyohou" ,NULL AS "gaipage_1" ,NULL AS "gaipage_2" ,NULL AS "gaipage_3" ,NULL AS "gaipage_4" ,NULL AS "gaipage_5" ,'データ種別：被保険者台帳' AS "taishojyohoutayitoru" ,'取得情報' AS "kaishitayitoru" ,'喪失情報' AS "shuryotayitoru" ,'資格' AS "kubuntayitoru" ,NULL AS "idojyohoutayitoru_1" ,NULL AS "idojyohoutayitoru_2" ,NULL AS "idojyohoutayitoru_3" ,NULL AS "kaishiYMDtayitoru" ,NULL AS "shuryoYMDtayitoru" ,'異動情報' AS "idojyohoutayitoru_4" ,NULL AS "idojyohoutayitoru_5" ,NULL AS "idojyohoutayitoru_6" ,NULL AS "kaishiYMDdata_zen" ,NULL AS "shuryoYMDdata_zen" ,NULL AS "kaishiYMDdata_go" ,NULL AS "shuryoYMDdata_go" ,NULL AS "idojyohoudata_1" ,NULL AS "idojyohoudata_2" ,NULL AS "idojyohoudata_3" ,NULL AS "idojyohoudata_5" ,NULL AS "idojyohoudata_6" ,dbT1001."hihokenshaNo" AS "hihokenshaNo" ,dbT1001."shikibetsuCode" AS "shikibetsuCode" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = TRUE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('01','03','04','07','08','09','12','18','46','49') THEN dbT1001."shikakuShutokuJiyuCode" ELSE NULL END AS "shutokujyohou_zen_jiyu" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = TRUE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('01','03','04','07','08','09','12','18','46','49') THEN dbT1001."shikakuShutokuYMD" ELSE NULL END AS "shutokujyohou_zen_idoYMD" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = TRUE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('01','03','04','07','08','09','12','18','46','49') THEN dbT1001."shikakuShutokuTodokedeYMD" ELSE NULL END AS "shutokujyohou_zen_todokedeYMD" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = TRUE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('01','03','04','07','08','09','12','18','46','49') THEN '取得削除' ELSE NULL END AS "idojyohoudata_4" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = TRUE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('51','52','53','55','57','58','68','99') THEN dbT1001."shikakuSoshitsuJiyuCode" ELSE NULL END AS "soshitsujyohou_zen_jiyu"
,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = TRUE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('51','52','53','55','57','58','68','99') THEN dbT1001."shikakuSoshitsuYMD" ELSE NULL END AS "soshitsujyohou_zen_idoYMD" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = TRUE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('51','52','53','55','57','58','68','99') THEN dbT1001."shikakuSoshitsuTodokedeYMD" ELSE NULL END AS "soshitsujyohou_zen_todokedeYMD" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = TRUE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('51','52','53','55','57','58','68','99') THEN '喪失削除' ELSE NULL END AS "idojyohoudata_4" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = TRUE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('21','22','11','13','14','15','17','16','41','42','23','24','48') THEN dbT1001."shikakuHenkoJiyuCode" ELSE NULL END AS "shutokujyohou_zen_jiyu" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = TRUE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('21','22','11','13','14','15','17','16','41','42','23','24','48') THEN dbT1001."shikakuHenkoYMD" ELSE NULL END AS "shutokujyohou_zen_idoYMD" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = TRUE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('21','22','11','13','14','15','17','16','41','42','23','24','48') THEN dbT1001."shikakuHenkoTodokedeYMD" ELSE NULL END AS "shutokujyohou_zen_todokedeYMD" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = TRUE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('21','22','11','13','14','15','17','16','41','42','23','24','48') THEN '変更削除' ELSE NULL END AS "idojyohoudata_4" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = TRUE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('05') THEN dbT1001."jushochitokureiTekiyoJiyuCode" ELSE NULL END AS "shutokujyohou_zen_jiyu" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = TRUE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('05') THEN dbT1001."jushochitokureiTekiyoYMD" ELSE NULL END AS "shutokujyohou_zen_idoYMD" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = TRUE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('05') THEN dbT1001."jushochitokureiTekiyoTodokedeYMD" ELSE NULL END AS "shutokujyohou_zen_todokedeYMD" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = TRUE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('05') THEN '住特適用削除' ELSE NULL END AS "idojyohoudata_4" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = TRUE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('71','72') THEN dbT1001."jushochitokureiKaijoJiyuCode" ELSE NULL END AS "soshitsujyohou_go_jiyu" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = TRUE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('71','72') THEN dbT1001."jushochitokureiKaijoYMD" ELSE NULL END AS "soshitsujyohou_go_idoYMD" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = TRUE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('71','72') THEN dbT1001."jushochitokureiKaijoTodokedeYMD" ELSE NULL END AS "soshitsujyohou_go_todokedeYMD" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = TRUE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('71','72') THEN '住特解除削除' ELSE NULL END AS "idojyohoudata_4" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('01','03','04','07','08','09','12','18','46','49') THEN dbT1001."shikakuShutokuJiyuCode" ELSE NULL END AS "shutokujyohou_go_jiyu" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('01','03','04','07','08','09','12','18','46','49') THEN dbT1001."shikakuShutokuYMD" ELSE NULL END AS "shutokujyohou_go_idoYMD" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('01','03','04','07','08','09','12','18','46','49') THEN dbT1001."shikakuShutokuTodokedeYMD" ELSE NULL END AS "shutokujyohou_go_todokedeYMD" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('01','03','04','07','08','09','12','18','46','49') THEN '取得異動' ELSE NULL END AS "idojyohoudata_4" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('51','52','53','55','57','58','68','99') THEN dbT1001."shikakuSoshitsuJiyuCode" ELSE NULL END AS "soshitsujyohou_go_jiyu" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('51','52','53','55','57','58','68','99') THEN dbT1001."shikakuSoshitsuYMD" ELSE NULL END AS "soshitsujyohou_go_idoYMD" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('51','52','53','55','57','58','68','99') THEN dbT1001."shikakuSoshitsuTodokedeYMD" ELSE NULL END AS "soshitsujyohou_go_todokedeYMD" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('51','52','53','55','57','58','68','99') THEN '喪失異動' ELSE NULL END AS "idojyohoudata_4" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('21','22','11','13','14','15','17','16','41','42','23','24','48') THEN dbT1001."shikakuHenkoJiyuCode" ELSE NULL END AS "shutokujyohou_go_jiyu" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('21','22','11','13','14','15','17','16','41','42','23','24','48') THEN dbT1001."shikakuHenkoYMD" ELSE NULL END AS "shutokujyohou_go_idoYMD" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('21','22','11','13','14','15','17','16','41','42','23','24','48') THEN dbT1001."shikakuHenkoTodokedeYMD" ELSE NULL END AS "shutokujyohou_go_todokedeYMD" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('21','22','11','13','14','15','17','16','41','42','23','24','48') THEN '変更異動' ELSE NULL END AS "idojyohoudata_4" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('05') THEN dbT1001."jushochitokureiTekiyoJiyuCode" ELSE NULL END AS "shutokujyohou_go_jiyu" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('05') THEN dbT1001."jushochitokureiTekiyoYMD" ELSE NULL END AS "shutokujyohou_go_idoYMD" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('05') THEN dbT1001."jushochitokureiTekiyoTodokedeYMD" ELSE NULL END AS "shutokujyohou_go_todokedeYMD" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('05') THEN '住特適用異動' ELSE NULL END AS "idojyohoudata_4" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('71','72') THEN dbT1001."jushochitokureiKaijoJiyuCode" ELSE NULL END AS "soshitsujyohou_go_jiyu" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('71','72') THEN dbT1001."jushochitokureiKaijoYMD" ELSE NULL END AS "soshitsujyohou_go_idoYMD" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('71','72') THEN dbT1001."jushochitokureiKaijoTodokedeYMD" ELSE NULL END AS "soshitsujyohou_go_todokedeYMD" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('71','72') THEN '住特解除異動' ELSE NULL END AS "idojyohoudata_4" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = TRUE THEN dbT1001."hihokennshaKubunCode" ELSE NULL END AS "kubun_zen_shikaku" ,CASE WHEN dbT1001."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE THEN dbT1001."hihokennshaKubunCode" ELSE NULL END AS "kubun_go_shikaku" FROM rgdb."DbT1001HihokenshaDaicho" AS dbT1001 WHERE TO_TIMESTAMP(#{konkaikaishiYMDHMS},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF3') <= dbT1001."lastUpdateTimestamp" AND dbT1001."lastUpdateTimestamp" <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{konkaishuryoYMDHMS},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF3') AND dbT1001."insertReamsLoginId" = 'anonymous' AND ( dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('01','03','04','07','08','09','12','18','46','49') OR dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('51','52','53','55','57','58','68','99') OR dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('21','22','11','13','14','15','17','16','41','42','23','24','48')
OR dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('05') OR dbT1001."idoJiyuCode" IN ('71','72') )

SELECT T1."shikibetsuCode" AS "shikibetsuCode" ,T1."idoJiyuCode" AS "idoJiyuCode" ,T1."tekiyoYMD" AS "tekiyoYMD" ,T1."tekiyoTodokedeYMD" AS "tekiyoTodokedeYMD" ,T1."kaijoYMD" AS "kaijoYMD" ,T1."kaijoTodokedeYMD" AS "kaijoTodokedeYMD" ,T1."logicalDeletedFlag" AS "logicalDeletedFlag" ,T1."lastUpdateTimestamp" AS "lastUpdateTimestamp" ,A."nyushoShisetsuCode" AS "nyushoShisetsuCode" ,A."nyushoYMD" AS "nyushoYMD" ,A."taishoYMD" AS "taishoYMD" FROM rgdb."DbT1003TashichosonJushochiTokurei" T1 LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho" A ON A."shikibetsuCode" = T1."shikibetsuCode" AND A."daichoShubetsu" = '2' WHERE TO_TIMESTAMP(#{konkaikaishiYMDHMS},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF3') <= T1."lastUpdateTimestamp" AND T1."lastUpdateTimestamp" <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{konkaishuryoYMDHMS},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF3') AND T1."idoJiyuCode" IN ('01','08','99') AND T1."insertTimestamp" = A."insertTimestamp" AND T1."insertReamsLoginId" = 'anonymous' ORDER BY T1."shikibetsuCode" DESC

SELECT B."shikibetsuCode" AS "shikibetsuCode" ,NULL AS "idoJiyuCode" ,NULL AS "tekiyoYMD" ,NULL AS "tekiyoTodokedeYMD" ,NULL AS "kaijoYMD" ,NULL AS "kaijoTodokedeYMD" ,B."isDeleted" AS "logicalDeletedFlag" ,B."lastUpdateTimestamp" AS "lastUpdateTimestamp" ,B."nyushoShisetsuCode" AS "nyushoShisetsuCode" ,B."nyushoYMD" AS "nyushoYMD" ,B."taishoYMD" AS "taishoYMD" FROM rgdb."DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho" B WHERE TO_TIMESTAMP(#{konkaikaishiYMDHMS},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF3') <= B."lastUpdateTimestamp" AND B."lastUpdateTimestamp" <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{konkaishuryoYMDHMS},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF3') AND B."daichoShubetsu" = '2' AND B."isDeleted" = FALSE AND B."insertReamsLoginId" = 'anonymous' ORDER BY B."shikibetsuCode" DESC

SELECT T1."shikibetsuCode" AS "shikibetsuCode" ,T1."idoJiyuCode" AS "idoJiyuCode" ,T1."tekiyoYMD" AS "tekiyoYMD" ,T1."tekiyoTodokedeYMD" AS "tekiyoTodokedeYMD" ,T1."kaijoYMD" AS "kaijoYMD" ,T1."kaijoTodokedeYMD" AS "kaijoTodokedeYMD" ,T1."logicalDeletedFlag" AS "logicalDeletedFlag" ,T1."lastUpdateTimestamp" AS "lastUpdateTimestamp" ,C."nyushoShisetsuCode" AS "nyushoShisetsuCode" ,C."nyushoYMD" AS "nyushoYMD" ,C."taishoYMD" AS "taishoYMD" FROM rgdb."DbT1003TashichosonJushochiTokurei" T1 LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho" C ON C."shikibetsuCode" = T1."shikibetsuCode" AND C."daichoShubetsu" = '2' WHERE TO_TIMESTAMP(#{konkaikaishiYMDHMS},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF3') <= T1."lastUpdateTimestamp" AND T1."lastUpdateTimestamp" <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{konkaishuryoYMDHMS},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF3') AND T1."idoJiyuCode" IN ('51','52','53','58','99')
AND T1."insertTimestamp" = C."insertTimestamp" AND T1."insertReamsLoginId" = 'anonymous' ORDER BY T1."shikibetsuCode" DESC

SELECT T1."shikibetsuCode" AS "shikibetsuCode" ,T1."idoJiyuCode" AS "idoJiyuCode" ,T1."tekiyoYMD" AS "tekiyoYMD" ,T1."tekiyoTodokedeYMD" AS "tekiyoTodokedeYMD" ,T1."kaijoYMD" AS "kaijoYMD" ,T1."kaijoTodokedeYMD" AS "kaijoTodokedeYMD" ,T1."logicalDeletedFlag" AS "logicalDeletedFlag" ,T1."lastUpdateTimestamp" AS "lastUpdateTimestamp" ,A."nyushoShisetsuCode" AS "nyushoShisetsuCode" ,A."nyushoYMD" AS "nyushoYMD" ,A."taishoYMD" AS "taishoYMD" FROM rgdb."DbT1002TekiyoJogaisha" T1 LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho" A ON A."shikibetsuCode" = T1."shikibetsuCode" AND A."daichoShubetsu" = '3' WHERE TO_TIMESTAMP(#{konkaikaishiYMDHMS},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF3') <= T1."lastUpdateTimestamp" AND T1."lastUpdateTimestamp" <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{konkaishuryoYMDHMS},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF3') AND T1."idoJiyuCode" IN ('01','08','99') AND T1."insertTimestamp" = A."insertTimestamp" AND T1."insertReamsLoginId" = 'anonymous' ORDER BY T1."shikibetsuCode"

SELECT B."shikibetsuCode" AS "shikibetsuCode" ,NULL AS "idoJiyuCode" ,NULL AS "tekiyoYMD" ,NULL AS "tekiyoTodokedeYMD" ,NULL AS "kaijoYMD" ,NULL AS "kaijoTodokedeYMD" ,B."isDeleted" AS "logicalDeletedFlag" ,B."lastUpdateTimestamp" AS "lastUpdateTimestamp" ,B."nyushoShisetsuCode" AS "nyushoShisetsuCode" ,B."nyushoYMD" AS "nyushoYMD" ,B."taishoYMD" AS "taishoYMD" FROM rgdb."DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho" B WHERE TO_TIMESTAMP(#{konkaikaishiYMDHMS},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF3') <= B."lastUpdateTimestamp" AND B."lastUpdateTimestamp" <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{konkaishuryoYMDHMS},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF3')
AND B."daichoShubetsu" = '3' AND B."isDeleted" = FALSE AND B."insertReamsLoginId" = 'anonymous' ORDER BY B."shikibetsuCode" DESC

SELECT T1."shikibetsuCode" AS "shikibetsuCode" ,T1."idoJiyuCode" AS "idoJiyuCode" ,T1."tekiyoYMD" AS "tekiyoYMD" ,T1."tekiyoTodokedeYMD" AS "tekiyoTodokedeYMD" ,T1."kaijoYMD" AS "kaijoYMD" ,T1."kaijoTodokedeYMD" AS "kaijoTodokedeYMD" ,T1."logicalDeletedFlag" AS "logicalDeletedFlag" ,T1."lastUpdateTimestamp" AS "lastUpdateTimestamp" ,C."nyushoShisetsuCode" AS "nyushoShisetsuCode" ,C."nyushoYMD" AS "nyushoYMD" ,C."taishoYMD" AS "taishoYMD" FROM rgdb."DbT1002TekiyoJogaisha" T1 LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho" C ON C."shikibetsuCode" = T1."shikibetsuCode" AND C."daichoShubetsu" = '3' WHERE TO_TIMESTAMP(#{konkaikaishiYMDHMS},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF3') <= T1."lastUpdateTimestamp" AND T1."lastUpdateTimestamp" <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{konkaishuryoYMDHMS},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF3') AND T1."idoJiyuCode" IN ('51','52','53','58','99') AND T1."insertTimestamp" = C."insertTimestamp" AND T1."insertReamsLoginId" = 'anonymous' ORDER BY T1."shikibetsuCode"
SELECT PSM."meisho" AS "meisho" ,PSM."kanaMeisho" AS "kanaMeisho" ,PSM."setaiCode" AS "setaiCode" FROM rgua.${psmShikibetsuTaisho} AS PSM
